StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateMudQCDate]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@OrgId int, @LastEditBy varchar(15), @QCDate date.me
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
--- UPDATE MUD FILE BASED ON ZIPCODES IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[MUD_QC_DATE] WHERE ORG_ID = @OrgId) BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[MUD_QC_DATE] SET QC_DATE = @QCDate, USER_LOGIN = @LastEditBy WHERE ORG_ID = @OrgId END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[MUD_QC_DATE] SELECT @OrgId, @LastEditBy, @QCDate END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
